string-array.name: senegal_nationality_list
string-array.item: Other African nationalities of the Franc Zone

string-array.name: senegal_exploited_reasons_list
string-array.item: Fallow fields and natural vegetation between fields is active
Shrublands/savannas (some shrubs under five meters tall grass)
Shrubby closed (covered shrub continues, little grass)
Forest, open/woodland (natural mosaic of shrubs, trees and grass)
Forest, moderate (combined cover of trees and shrubs, some grass)
Forest, dense (closed canopy of trees, some shrubs and grass)
Urban continues (houses, streets, few trees or grass patch)
Urban, discontinuous (mainly grass and trees with some houses)

string-array.name: senegal_credit_type_list
string-array.item: Investment Credit(over the last five years)

string-array.name: senegal_breeding_organization_list
string-array.item: Association of young farmers and ranchers Development Niayes
National Association of Professional Meat and Livestock of Senegal (ANPROVBS)
National Federation of the actors in the dairy sector (FENAFILS)
National Union of Cooperatives of farmers (Unce)
Senegalese Association of Cattle Breeders and Dealers

string-array.name: senegal_species_name_list
string-array.item: Cattle - Cow (4 years old and female)
Cattle - Male neutered of any age

string-array.name: senegal_expenses_nature_name_list
string-array.item: Purchases of farm animals (for the period 2014–2015 or 2015)
Health and reproduction costs (insemination) (for the period 2014–2015 or 2015)

string-array.name: zambia_education_list
string-array.item: Self taught with no formal education

string-array.name: zambia_field_type_list
string-array.item: Croplands (fallow and active fields with natural vegetation in between fields)
Shrubland/Savannas (few shrubs less than 5 feet high, grass)
Shrublands, Closed (continuous shrub canopy, little grass)
Forest, open/woody savanna (natural mosaic of shrubs, trees and grass)
Forest, moderate (mixed canopy of trees and shrubs, little grass)
Forest, dense (closed canopy of trees, few shrubs and grass)
Urban, Continuous (houses, streets, few trees or grass patches)
Urban, Discontinuous (mostly grass or trees with few houses)

string-array.name: tunisia_education_source_list
string-array.item: Master - Specialized Master - Diplomas of Specialized Higher Studies (DESS)

string-array.name: tunisia_field_type_list
string-array.item: Cultivation (fallow fields and natural vegetation between fields is active)
Shrublands/savannas (some shrubs under five meters tall grass)

Forest, open/woodland (natural mosaic of shrubs, trees and grass)

Forest, dense(closed canopy of trees, some shrubs and grass)
